org.projectfloodlight.openflow.util

Class HexString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projectfloodlight.openflow.util.HexString

  • public final class HexString
extends Object
    Utility method to convert hexadecimal string from/to longs and byte arrays.
    Author:
    Andreas Wundsam <andreas.wundsam@bigswitch.com>

      • toBytes

        public static byte[] toBytes(String values)

        Convert a string of hex values into a string of bytes.
        Parameters:
        values - "0f:ca:fe:de:ad:be:ef"
        Returns:

        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - If the string can not be parsed
